scripts.publicar: npm install && npm run codeMirror && npm run css && npm run copiarWind
scripts.publicarLinux: npm install && npm run codeMirror && npm run css && npm run copiarLinux
scripts.copiarLinux: mkdir -p dist/img && mkdir -p dist/js && cp -R img dist && cp -R index.html dist && cp -R js dist
scripts.copiarWind: xcopy img\* dist\img\* && xcopy index.html dist\* && xcopy js\*.js dist\js\*
